entry.source: {F812}Gabriel\0{F87A,-13}{F813,0,250002}This is what was once Shene Duque.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,250003}It is now the eye that watches over{F801}the Eastern Kingdom of Mikado...{F801}the new Mikado Castle.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Gabriel\0{F87A,-13}{F813,0,250002}This is what was once Shene Duque.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,250003}It is now the eye that watches over{F801}the Eastern Kingdom of Mikado...{F801}the new Mikado Castle.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Raphael\0{F87A,-15}{F813,0,250005}But in Tokyo, the gate to the Expanse{F801}was opened with Tayama's death. Order{F801}there has been lost.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,250006}We have sealed Naraku...{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Raphael\0{F87A,-15}{F813,0,250005}But in Tokyo, the gate to the Expanse{F801}was opened with Tayama's death. Order{F801}there has been lost.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,250006}We have sealed Naraku...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Uriel\0{F87A,-19}{F813,0,250007}...But the Filth will once again head{F801}for Naraku, just as they did in days{F801}of old.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Uriel\0{F87A,-19}{F813,0,250007}...But the Filth will once again head{F801}for Naraku, just as they did in days{F801}of old.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Gabriel\0{F87A,-13}{F813,0,250008}Blessed warriors of light, we require{F801}your assistance.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,250009}We have decided to annihilate Tokyo.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Gabriel\0{F87A,-13}{F813,0,250008}Blessed warriors of light, we require{F801}your assistance.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,250009}We have decided to annihilate Tokyo.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Gabriel\0{F87A,-13}{F813,0,250014}If the Yamato Reactor is allowed to{F801}run amok, Great Abaddon... a black{F801}hole... will be created.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,250015}Our plan is to have Great Abaddon{F801}swallow up Tokyo.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Gabriel\0{F87A,-13}{F813,0,250014}If the Yamato Reactor is allowed to{F801}run amok, Great Abaddon... a black{F801}hole... will be created.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,250015}Our plan is to have Great Abaddon{F801}swallow up Tokyo.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Gabriel\0{F87A,-13}{F813,0,250017}He will surely stand in our way. We{F801}must devise a plan to deal with him.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Gabriel\0{F87A,-13}{F813,0,250017}He will surely stand in our way. We{F801}must devise a plan to deal with him.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Gabriel\0{F87A,-13}{F813,0,250022}Who will serve as the blessed martyr?{F801}Will it be you, Jonathan? Or you,{F801}{F843,0}?{F801}{F802}{F813,0,250023}We will remain here in anticipation{F801}of your choice.{F801}

entry.target: {F812}Angel\0{F87A,205}{F813,0,250057}I am the Lord's chariot, the seraph{F801}Merkabah.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Merkabah\0{F87A,205}{F813,0,250058}Filth, or "doubts," must be cleansed{F801}from this world.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Merkabah\0{F87A,205}{F813,0,250058}Filth, or "doubts," must be cleansed{F801}from this world.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Gabriel\0{F87A,88}{F813,0,250037}We have been waiting for you, blessed{F801}warriors of light.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Gabriel\0{F87A,88}{F813,0,250037}We have been waiting for you, blessed{F801}warriors of light.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Gabriel\0{F87A,88}{F813,0,250038}Which of you will fuse with us and{F801}enter martyrdom...?{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Gabriel\0{F87A,88}{F813,0,250038}Which of you will fuse with us and{F801}enter martyrdom...?{F801}

entry.source: "I'll do it."{F801}Ask Jonathan to do it{F801}"I need more time to think about this."{F801}
entry.target: "I'll do it."{F801}Ask Jonathan to do it{F801}"I need more time to think about this."{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Gabriel\0{F87A,88}...Then leave this place for now.{F801}{F802}Come to us again when you are prepared,{F801}truly blessed warriors of the Lord.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Gabriel\0{F87A,88}...Then leave this place for now.{F801}{F802}Come to us again when you are prepared,{F801}truly blessed warriors of the Lord.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Jonathan\0{F87A,3}{F87B,3,10,1,2}{F813,0,250043}I have ever been at a loss...{F801}{F802}{F813,0,250044}Both humans and demons speak only of{F801}themselves whenever they open their{F801}mouths...{F801}{F802}{F87B,3,3,1,1}{F813,0,250045}If only people would think and act for{F801}the sake of their fellow man... Just{F801}imagine it...{F801}{F802}{F813,0,250046}What is preventing them from doing so?{F801}Why can they not shed a tear for the{F801}plight of others?{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Jonathan\0{F87A,3}{F87B,3,10,1,2}{F813,0,250043}I have ever been at a loss...{F801}{F802}{F813,0,250044}Both humans and demons speak only of{F801}themselves whenever they open their{F801}mouths...{F801}{F802}{F87B,3,3,1,1}{F813,0,250045}If only people would think and act for{F801}the sake of their fellow man... Just{F801}imagine it...{F801}{F802}{F813,0,250046}What is preventing them from doing so?{F801}Why can they not shed a tear for the{F801}plight of others?{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Jonathan\0{F87A,3}{F87B,3,2,1,1}{F813,0,250047}Are humans creatures which cannot band{F801}together as one? Are they creatures{F801}not worth salvation...?{F801}{F802}{F87B,3,12,1,2}{F813,0,250048}But now, I understand what I must do.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Jonathan\0{F87A,3}{F87B,3,2,1,1}{F813,0,250047}Are humans creatures which cannot band{F801}together as one? Are they creatures{F801}not worth salvation...?{F801}{F802}{F87B,3,12,1,2}{F813,0,250048}But now, I understand what I must do.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Jonathan\0{F87A,3}{F87B,3,7,1,2}{F813,0,250049}I am one of those people. I am at{F801}a loss; wracked with anxiety.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Jonathan\0{F87A,3}{F87B,3,7,1,2}{F813,0,250049}I am one of those people. I am at{F801}a loss; wracked with anxiety.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Jonathan\0{F87A,3}{F87B,3,7,1,2}{F813,0,250050}That is why... I will sacrifice{F801}everything to drive out everyone's{F801}fear and doubt.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,250051}I do this to forge a new world... one{F801}where today's peace lasts unto eternity.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Jonathan\0{F87A,3}{F87B,3,7,1,2}{F813,0,250050}That is why... I will sacrifice{F801}everything to drive out everyone's{F801}fear and doubt.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,250051}I do this to forge a new world... one{F801}where today's peace lasts unto eternity.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Jonathan\0{F87A,3}{F87B,3,3,1,1}{F813,0,250031}That day we went to the rooftop of{F801}Mikado Castle...{F801}{F802}{F813,0,250032}I vowed then that I would fulfill my{F801}role as a Samurai for the sake of the{F801}people.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,250033}Yet, now that the specter of death has{F801}been raised before me, I... I...!{F801}

entry.target: {F812}Michael\0{F87A,-11}{F813,0,250004}We have purified every last Filth in{F801}the Eastern Kingdom of Mikado.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Gabriel\0{F87A,-13}{F813,0,250011}It is infested with demons... They are{F801}possessed by "knowledge" and have{F801}lost sight of what must be done.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,250012}There is no other way if we are to{F801}purify them and sever the roots of{F801}the Filth.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,250013}These are the wishes of the Lord...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Uriel\0{F87A,-19}{F813,0,250016}However... we have heard troubling{F801}news that the Demon Lord Lucifer has{F801}resurrected in Tokyo.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Uriel\0{F87A,-19}{F813,0,250016}However... we have heard troubling{F801}news that the Demon Lord Lucifer has{F801}resurrected in Tokyo.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Michael\0{F87A,-11}{F813,0,250018}If we archangels, the heralds of the{F801}Lord, were to fuse with the son of man{F801}that He has chosen...{F801}{F802}{F813,0,250019}It would bring forth the power of{F801}God's chariot, which exceeds that of{F801}the Demon Lord.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Michael\0{F87A,-11}{F813,0,250018}If we archangels, the heralds of the{F801}Lord, were to fuse with the son of man{F801}that He has chosen...{F801}{F802}{F813,0,250019}It would bring forth the power of{F801}God's chariot, which exceeds that of{F801}the Demon Lord.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Raphael\0{F87A,-15}{F813,0,250021}But to fuse with us is akin to facing{F801}death for one of your kind.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Raphael\0{F87A,-15}{F813,0,250021}But to fuse with us is akin to facing{F801}death for one of your kind.{F801}
